metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4385 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
letodms 3.3.6 has CSRF via change password

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

letodms - 3.3.11+dfsg-1
letodms-webdav - 3.3.11+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: letodms package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.11+dfsg-1').
